content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://melchiadls2bis.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

    -- This is with abfss
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://raw@melchiadls2bis.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


    -- Examine the data tyoes for the columns


    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://raw@melchiadls2bis.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'

-- max of len of all columns
    SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) AS len_LocationId,
    MAX(LEN(Borough))  AS len_Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) AS len_Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) AS len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://raw@melchiadls2bis.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


    -- Use WITH clause to provide explicit data types
     SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://raw@melchiadls2bis.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]

    -- Examine the data tyoes for the columns with true sizes

    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
    SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://raw@melchiadls2bis.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]
    '

-- system collation

SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://raw@melchiadls2bis.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )
    AS [result]


    CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

    USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

    ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

    SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://raw@melchiadls2bis.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]
